name: Legion
description:
# Legion
Legion is a Solitaire game, played with 52 cards. The game has the following piles:
- 1 draw pile of type "rotate"
- 4 `FOUNDATION` piles
- 7 `COLUMN` piles
## Actions
Actions in the game move cards between piles. Each action has conditions that defines its validity. These conditions may involve the following keywords:
* Source card: The source card is the card that is being moved. If a stack of cards is being moved together, the source card is the first card in that stack.
* Source pile: The source pile is the pile that the source card belongs to prior to the movement. If the source pile is empty, no source card exists, and any conditions involving it are resolved as False.
* Destination pile: The destination pile is the target pile that the source card is being moved to.
* Destination card: The destination card is the top card (rightmost card) of the destination pile. If the destination pile is empty, no destination card exists, and any conditions involving it are resolved as False.
The following actions are possible in the game:
### Draw
- `draw`: The draw action will turn the top 1 card from the draw pile face-up. Only the top 3 cards are shown in the game state. At any point, only the top card of the draw pile can be moved. When all the cards in the draw pile are turned face-up, drawing will rotate all of its cards that haven't been moved back into the draw pile in the order they were drawn. This can be done for an unlimited number of times.
### Move
A `move` action is valid if it matches one of the listed types, meets all conditions, and only involves face-up cards.
- `move` from a DRAW pile to a COLUMN pile: This will move one card from a DRAW pile to a COLUMN pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination card and source card should have alternating suit colors 
        1.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, descending ranks 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        2.2. The source card should have rank K 
- `move` from a COLUMN pile to a COLUMN pile: This will move one card from a COLUMN pile to a COLUMN pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination card and source card should have alternating suit colors 
        1.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, descending ranks 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        2.2. The source card should have rank K 
- `move` from a FOUNDATION pile to a COLUMN pile: This will move one card from a FOUNDATION pile to a COLUMN pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination card and source card should have alternating suit colors 
        1.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, descending ranks 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        2.2. The source card should have rank K 
- `move` from a COLUMN pile to a FOUNDATION pile: This will move one card from a COLUMN pile to a FOUNDATION pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        1.2. The source card should have rank 1 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination card and source card should have matching suits 
        2.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, ascending ranks 
- `move` from a DRAW pile to a FOUNDATION pile: This will move one card from a DRAW pile to a FOUNDATION pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        1.2. The source card should have rank 1 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination card and source card should have matching suits 
        2.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, ascending ranks 
- `move` from a FOUNDATION pile to a FOUNDATION pile: This will move one card from a FOUNDATION pile to a FOUNDATION pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: At least one of the following should be true:
    1. All of the following should be true:
        1.1. The destination pile should be empty 
        1.2. The source card should have rank 1 
    2. All of the following should be true:
        2.1. The destination card and source card should have matching suits 
        2.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, ascending ranks 
### Move Stack
A `move_stack` action is valid if it matches one of the listed types, meets all conditions, and only involves face-up cards (all cards in the moving stack should be face-up).
- `move_stack` from a COLUMN pile to a COLUMN pile: This will move a stack of at least two cards from a COLUMN pile to a COLUMN pile and is valid if and only if the following condition is true:
Condition: All of the following should be true:
    1. All cards in the stack should have alternating suit colors 
    2. All cards in the stack should form a sequence of consecutive, descending ranks 
    3. At least one of the following should be true:
        3.1. All of the following should be true:
            3.1.1. The destination card and source card should have alternating suit colors 
            3.1.2. The destination card and source card should form a sequence of consecutive, descending ranks 
        3.2. All of the following should be true:
            3.2.1. The destination pile should be empty 
            3.2.2. The source card should have rank K 
## Win Condition
To win the game, the following condition should be true:
Condition: All of the following should be true:
    1. ALL COLUMN piles should be empty 
    2. ALL DRAW piles should be empty
